remarks: The connected component containing ` A ` is a closed set.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Mar-2015.)
statement:
concomp.2 $e |- S = U. { x e. ~P X | ( A e. x /\ ( J |`t x ) e. Con ) } $.
concompcld $p |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ A e. X ) -> S e. ( Clsd ` J ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d J x $.
$d X x $.
